variable.comment: The total distance run so far, in pixels.
variable.name: TotalDistance

variable.comment: Counts up to 'NextBlock', at which point a new block is created.
variable.name: CurrentDistance

variable.comment: Random number to choose between day or night
variable.name: daynight

variable.comment: The distance after which to create the next block.
variable.name: NextBlock

events.comment: move the background back to wrap it infinitely
create all blocks and enemies and stars and everything
set player acc to cope with platform acc
destroy bullet on collision with floor
create a star pickup. 5% chance of happening
kill enemy on collision with bullet
destroy enemy if it collides with a block outside its own

sub-events.comment: kill enemy if we jump from above
kill us if we collide with enemy from below
